contest-event.event-date:
June 21, 2014 D Bernisch Kantonales Musikfest (Second Section)
Bernisches Kantonal-Musikfest (Second Section) 20 Set Test and Own Choice Bernisches Kantonal-Musikfest bernisch-kantonales-musikfest-buren-a-a
Switzerland
The Son of the Sun
Aarwangen, BE, Switzerland Jury Set Work: Tuor, Bangerter, Bamert Jury Own Choice: Kolly, Duc, Capra
Own Choices also played: Christo Redentor - Steven Ponsford, Music for a Festival - Philip Sparke, Turris Fortissima - Steven Ponsford, 2x Fire in the Blood - Paul Lovatt-Cooper, Occasion - Edward Gregson, Olympus - Philip Harper, Purpose - Paul Sharman, A Cambrian Suite - Michael Ball, Newstead - Goff Richards
Sept. 23, 2012, 8:34 a.m. June 7, 2019, 7:52 p.m.
